title: How do I follow a discussion?
body:
Possible noob question but I can't seem to figure out how to follow a discussion.

Is there any way to star/favorite a discussion so I can follow it independent of whether or not I've actually participated in the discussion?

replies.body: I'm afraid that this is not a feature the board currently has.

Oh ok thank you for the quick reply!

I feel less stupid for not being able to find it now lol

Personally I think this seems like it would be good feature

Using the "My Updates" feature is pretty similar, but I believe it only works if someone quotes you. (Not entirely sure how it works yet)
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/myupdates
You can use Ctrl+D to bookmark a page in both Chrome and Firefox.
